snippet.title: Facebook apologises for newly acquired WhatsApp's crash
snippet.description: WhatsApp went down for a couple of hours last night, and Facebook apologised just days after buying it.

snippet.title: 'The Matrix' is back (in your hospital)
snippet.description: There he is, Hugo Weaving as Agent Smith. Several Hugo Weavings weaving their way around a hospital. Welcome to the future -- or the present -- of GE software in a new ad.

snippet.title: Storify is fittingly acquired by Livefyre social curation platform
snippet.description: Both companies help direct social media for high-profile customers like The New York Times, The White House, HBO, and Microsoft, so, it only makes sense they would come together.

snippet.title: Apple has acquired nine companies since October
snippet.description: The Cupertino company is on the hunt for small companies, but is shy about making big acquisitions.

snippet.title: Hospital photos of brain surgery
snippet.description: A Houston-based hospital live tweets photos of brain surgery to explain to an audience each step involved.

snippet.title: Kutcher went on Jobs' fruitarian diet, landed in the hospital
snippet.description: Ashton Kutcher reveals that he was so desperate to be like the Apple co-founder that he tried Jobs' dietary habits -- to ill effect.

snippet.title: Revision3 acquired by Discovery
snippet.description: Web 2.0 video production company Revision3 has agreed to be acquired by Discovery Media as part of a deal that could put its content on the popular TV network.

snippet.title: Hashtag 'scalpel': Hospital to live-tweet ear surgery
snippet.description: Ever wished you could watch a surgical procedure unfold? Seattle's Swedish Medical Center is getting set to share a play-by-play of a cochlear implant operation.

snippet.title: OnLive acquired for just under $5 million
snippet.description: The cloud-gaming company was saddled with debt and was near closing before it received a new lease on life.

snippet.title: Ben Zotto's Penultimate acquired by Evernote
snippet.description: Popular iPad app for taking handwritten notes gets acquired. The founder talks about why he wrote the app and what's next for it.
